text:
To bring more play into our work and lives, we can look back at our childhood for inspiration. Reflecting on what activities brought us joy as kids can help us find ways to incorporate similar experiences into our daily routines.

By tapping into our childhood memories of play, we can rediscover what made us feel excited and alive. This process encourages us to think creatively about how to integrate fun into our current lives, whether through activities, games, or playful interactions. Recreating those joyful moments can enhance our work environment and personal satisfaction, making our days more enjoyable and fulfilling.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** To introduce more play into our workplaces and lives, we can reconnect with our past play memories and find ways to recreate those experiences.
